item.title:
We've just released Spring Boot 2.2: https://spring.io/blog/2019/10/16/spring-boot-2-2-0 …
Many thanks to everyone who contributed with pull requests, bug reports, and enhancement suggestions.

item.description: We've just released Spring Boot 2.2: https://spring.io/blog/2019/10/16/spring-boot-2-2-0 … Many thanks to everyone who contributed with pull requests, bug reports, and enhancement suggestions.

item.title:
Spring Initializr, the library that powers http://start.spring.io , just had its first release hitting Maven Central
See the blog post for more details:https://spring.io/blog/2019/10/14/spring-initializr-0-8-0-available-now …

item.title: Spring Boot 2.2.0.RC1 has been released. Please check it out and let us know of any problems. All being well, 2.2 will GA in a couple of weeks. https://spring.io/blog/2019/10/03/spring-boot-2-2-0-rc1-has-been-released …

item.title:
http://overcast.fm/+GwMI9Oscg
I had the pleasure & honor of interviewing my amazing friend & colleague @madhurabhave23, @springboot engineer, as part of the Women of @s1p Series. Check it out, then get your ticket to SpringOne to meet & hear Madhura!!! Hope to see you there. pic.twitter.com/FxXYmqaFKu

item.description: http://overcast.fm/+GwMI9Oscg  I had the pleasure & honor of interviewing my amazing friend & colleague @madhurabhave23, @springboot engineer, as part of the Women of @s1p Series.
